name: Steelyard Skirmish
description:
Steelyard Skirmish is a competitive 1v1 local multiplayer game about sabotage and repair. Two little bots from rival steel companies duke it out inside each other's factories, alternately working to repair and destroy pieces of the factories and gaining points in the process. Bash each other's factories and bash each other's heads as you compete across two rounds to outscore your opponent.

This game was made over the course of a single weekend in St. Louis at the 2020 Global Game Jam.

Credits: 

Isaac White: Programmer

Julian Foat: Artist

Logan Umbright: Artist

Maksim Smith: Artist

Controller Controls:

A: Start game

Left Joystick: Move

Right Trigger: Swing

A: Jump

Keyboard Controls:

Click: Start game

WASD: Player 1 move

E: Player 1 swing

Spacebar: Player 1 jump

Left and Right Arrow Keys: Player 2 move

Right Shift: Player 2 swing

Up Arrow Key: Player 2 jump
